text: Carlo Giustini (4 May 1923 â€“ 26 October 2005) was an Italian actor. He was sometimes called as Carlo Justini. Giustini is known for his roles in Wild, Wild Planet and War of the Planets. He died in Rome on 26 October 2005, at the age of 89. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1923 births Category:2005 deaths Category:Actors from Lazio Category:Italian movie actors
